visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart displaying the trends of various operating systems. The chart should have a title 'Operating Systems Trends' and a subtitle with a source link to Google Trends. The y-axis should have a maximum value of 100 and no title. The tooltip should display split values with a date format of 'Month Year' and crosshairs enabled. The data should be loaded from a CSV file hosted on Highcharts' sample data repository. The chart should be styled with specific colors for the series and additional configurations for margins, background, and legend.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a spline chart that visualizes the trends of various operating systems over time. The chart is titled 'Operating Systems Trends' and includes a subtitle with a link to the source data on Google Trends. The y-axis is set to a maximum value of 100 and does not display a title. The tooltip is configured to show split values with a date format of 'Month Year' and includes crosshairs for better readability. The data for the chart is loaded from a CSV file hosted on Highcharts' sample data repository. The chart uses specific colors for each series, enhancing visual distinction. Additional configurations include enabling the legend, aligning it to the right, and positioning it vertically in the middle. The plot options for the spline series include enabling markers for each data point. Finally, the credits are disabled to remove the Highcharts watermark from the chart.
